snippet: In our first Student Editorial Contest, we’re asking teenagers to write short, evidence-based persuasive essays like the editorials The New York Times publishes every day. Post yours here by March 17.
abstract: In our first Student Editorial Contest, we’re asking teenagers to write short, evidence-based persuasive essays like the editorials The New York Times publishes every day. Post yours here by March 17.

byline.original: By MICHAEL GONCHAR and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: Student Contest | Write an Editorial on an Issue That Matters to You
